name: Rody Fight - Game for Change
description:
Can you beat crime, corruption, drugs and smuggling in this level based action game?
Featuring a boss fight against a smuggler leader!
Punch and kick your way against holdupers and riding in tandems.
Destroy pork barrels with your powerful uppercut.
Infiltrate the drug lab and shoot the bad guys!
Remove red tapes!
Stop all kinds of abusive drivers guilty of using wangwang, swerving, beating the red light, not respecting the pedestrian lane and overspeeding.
All this in 6 months!

Secret sshhh
Unlock All Levels - Just tap the name Rody Duterte in the credits screen
